upeksha> ema adahasa hudekma winodaya udesa kala deyak misa kisiwakuge adahas wihiluwakata ganimata kala deyak nowe.aru ayiya weni asu piru than athi ayaku wihiluwata ganima ma weni nawakayakuta kisisethma kala nohaki,galapenne nathi karanayak bawa ma hodin watahagana sitimi.thani tharuwa,aru saha katussa athara aththe katussata pamanak wisheshitha wu karunaki.nawakayek wu ma palamuwen mage katussa nama yodagana an ayakuge lipiyak sadaha kament kale thanitharuwa palakala ee kale teli nam wu lipiyakataya.aru mata munagasuneda ema kament haraha misa sindiyak haraha noweya.ethan sita aruge adawiyata waha watuna ma ohu gana mawagana sitinne "boho asu piru than athi,sahalluwen sitimata uthsaha darana,ana aya sithana ayuru gana dukwi thama adahas wenas kara noganna tharuna mallek "lesataya' (aru ayiye,mema adahasa waradinam oyata wenas karanna puluwan ).ema tharuna mahalla samaga jiwithaya windimata mama kisiseth pasubata nowemi.ema wndimedi ohu mewani wadan thama walalukaren udata noganna bawatada ma hodakarawa danimi.

merata 147wana kowid aasaditha maranaya eeye (11) wartha wu bawa rajaye prawruththi departhamenthuwa niwedanaya kala.ee eeye dinayedi thawath kowid aasaditha maranayak wartha wimath samangayi.melesa miyagos aththe 82 hawiridi kolambaa 13 pradeshaye padinwi kanthawak.kolambaa jathika rohale sita kowid 19 aasadithayeku lesa handuna ganimen pasu mulleriyawa mulika rohalata maru kara yawa athi athara ema rohale dadi sathkara eekakaye prathikara labamin sitina athara adala kanthawa pasugiya 10 wanada miyagos thibenawa.maranayata hethuwa lesa adhika rudhira pidanaya saha kowid niyumoniyawa bawayi saukhya ansha danum dunne.

guru hawule sakachcha sabhawakadi me pilibandawa guruwarun danumwath kirimata da widuhalpathithuma piyawara gaththeya.mandalika tharagawalata mudal soyaganimedi sama gurubhawathekugenma rupiyal dahaya bagin wu aadhara mudalak labaganimata widuhalpathithuma gena thibu thiranayata dadi lesa wirodhaya pa guru hawule aacharyawaru eeta ekangathawaya pala nokaloya.

uthure awathan janathawata athyawashya bhanda parithyaga kirimata simasahitha richad piris saha samagame sabhapathi aacharya sena yaddehige mahatha katayuthu yoda thibini.kasala bandun, aarpiko metta, plastik putu jala tanki men ma gruha upakarana redipili da eeta athulath wiya.me parithyaga ragath lori ratha 10 k ikuth da wawuniyawata langa wuye kurunagala, dambaulla ha anuradhapura pihiti aarpiko pradarshanagarayanhi sewaka piris sanwidhanaya kara thibu aagamika wathawanta sahabhagi wimen anathuruwa ya.manik fam sahana gammanaye di sahanadhara ragath aarpiko kandayama mejar jenaral ji.ee. chandrasiri mahatha wisin piliganu labiya.rajaya wisin delaksha panasdahakata adhika awathan wu piris sandaha gena athi widhimath piyawara pilibandawa mejar janaral waraya wisin pahadili karana ladi.awathanwuwan wenuwen godananga athi gammana bala ganimata awasthawak da aarpiko sahanadhara kandayama sandaha sanwidhanaya kara thibini.
